text: avanu (doreyu, mahileyarodane), nivu yusuph‌rannu pusalayisalu prayatnisidaga nim'ma sthiti hegittu? Endu kelidanu. A mahileyaru, ‘‘allahanu kapadali. Navantu avanalli yava tappannu kanalilla’’ endaru. Aga saradarana patni helidalu; ‘‘iga satyavu bahirangavagibittide. Nijavagi nane avanannu pusalayisalu prayatnisidde. Avanu khandita satyavantane agiddane’’
